text: @realDonaldTrump How self centered and self absorbed can you be? Pence getting spotlight for the USAF graduation so you have to 1 up him and say you are speaking at West Point! Now over 1000 cadets have to make their way back to the epicenter of Coronavirus! What kind of idiot are you?
